overview:
Moshe is an executive and entrepreneur, experienced in TV, telecommunication, IT and, Media industries. Moshe has Held number of managerial roles in startups and large organizations.

In his recent role as CEO of PeerTV (AIM: PTV), Mr. Bartov has managed to restructure the company and rebuild it’s product line and customer base.

Mr. Bartov has 12 years of experience in software development and R&D management in several start-up companies as well as the IDF Signal Corps. Mr. Bartov served as Senior Product Marketing Manager at NDS, a provider of end-to-end software and hardware solutions for the pay television industry. At NDS, he managed NDS MediaHighway. Prior to working for NDS, he served in a number of management and executive marketing roles in organizations focusing on mobile data solutions and technologies. He served as a Director of Business Development at CellGlide, Vice President of Marketing at CT-Motion, Vice President of Business Development at Flash Networks and as Business Development Manager at Sun Microsystems, where he led the initial commercial Java to mobile devices deployments.
